scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan Yojana (PM-SYM)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; unorganised workers like street vendors, agriculture workers, construction workers, rickshaw pullers, etc.; age between 18-40; monthly income below ₹15,000; not a member of EPFO/ESIC/NPS.
scheme_description: Voluntary and contributory pension scheme with 50% contribution matched by Central Government.
benefits: Assured monthly pension of ₹3,000 after 60 years. Spouse eligible for 50% pension after death. ₹6,000/month jointly if both spouses are enrolled.

scheme_name: National Pension Scheme for Traders and The Self-employed Persons (NPS)
target_occupation: Small traders, shopkeepers, restaurant/hotel owners, real estate brokers
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; not covered under EPFO/ESIC/PM-SYM; annual turnover up to ₹1.5 crore.
scheme_description: Voluntary and contributory pension scheme with 50% matching contribution by Central Government.
benefits: Assured monthly pension of ₹3,000 after 60 years.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; bank account with Aadhaar; age 18-50 years; consent-based auto debit.
scheme_description: Life insurance scheme
benefits: ₹2 lakh on death due to any cause. Premium: ₹436/year.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; age 18-70; Aadhaar-linked bank account; auto-debit enabled.
scheme_description: Accident insurance scheme
benefits: ₹2 lakh for accidental death/disability; ₹1 lakh for partial disability. Premium: ₹20/year.

scheme_name: Atal Pension Yojana
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; Aadhaar-linked bank account; age between 18-40 years.
scheme_description: Voluntary pension scheme for unorganised sector workers.
application_process: Enrol through bank with Aadhaar-linked account
benefits: Pension ranging from ₹1000 to ₹5000/month post-60 years; accumulated sum goes to spouse or nominee after death.

scheme_name: Public Distribution System (PDS)
target_occupation: Families below poverty line, casual laborers
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; below poverty line; no member aged 15-59 or includes a disabled member; casual laborers.
scheme_description: Subsidized food grain distribution system.
application_process: Apply through state public distribution authority
benefits: 35 kg food grains/month for BPL families; 15 kg for others. Enabled as ONORC for migrants.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana - Gramin (PMAY-G)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; no member aged 15-59; families with disabled members; casual laborers without permanent job.
scheme_description: Housing assistance scheme for rural poor.
benefits: ₹1.2 lakh (plains) or ₹1.3 lakh (hills) for house construction.

scheme_name: National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; individuals with little or no means of income or support.
scheme_description: Social pension scheme for the elderly and vulnerable.
application_process: Apply through local social welfare office
benefits: Central assistance ₹300-₹500; total monthly pension ₹1000-₹3000 (incl. state share).

scheme_name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)
eligibility_criteria: SC/ST households; no adult male members; beggars or those dependent on alms.
scheme_description: Health insurance scheme for secondary and tertiary care.
application_process: Apply via health department or online portal
benefits: Health coverage of ₹5 lakhs/family/year for hospitalization.

scheme_name: e-Shram Portal
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; aged 16-59 years; working in unorganised sector (construction, agriculture, domestic work, etc.).
required_documents: Aadhaar number, bank account number, mobile number linked with Aadhaar
scheme_description: Centralised database and identity card for unorganised workers.
benefits: Access to welfare schemes, accidental insurance of ₹2 lakhs under PMSBY.

scheme_name: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM)
eligibility_criteria: Urban poor including street vendors, homeless, waste pickers, rickshaw pullers, etc.
scheme_description: Livelihood and skill development mission for urban poor.
application_process: Apply through Urban Local Bodies or Mission offices
benefits: Skill training, support for self-employment, affordable credit, and shelters for urban homeless.

scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; age 18+; residing in rural areas and willing to do unskilled manual work.
scheme_description: Wage employment guarantee scheme.
application_process: Apply via Gram Panchayat for job card
benefits: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment per year to rural households.

scheme_name: Deen Dayal Upadhyay - Gramin Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; aged 15-35 (relaxed to 45 for women and vulnerable groups).
scheme_description: Skills rural youth who are poor and provides them with jobs with regular wages.
benefits: Skill training and job placement above or equal to minimum wages.

scheme_name: Garib Kalyan Rozgar Yojana
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; workers in 25 identified sectors such as PM Kusum, cattle/poultry sheds, RURBAN mission, highways, etc.
scheme_description: Rural employment initiative for migrants and unskilled workers.
benefits: Employment for 125 days.

scheme_name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Antyodaya Yojana (DAY)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen intending to receive skill training.
scheme_description: Provides skill development and self-employment support to poor individuals.
application_process: Apply through official DAY portal or local implementation agencies.
benefits: Skill enhancement and financial support for business setup.

scheme_name: PM SVANidhi
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; street vendor with Certificate of Vending/ID from ULB; or identified in survey without certificate.
required_documents: Certificate of Vending or recognized survey record
scheme_description: Micro-credit scheme for street vendors.
application_process: Apply online through PM SVANidhi portal.
benefits: Working capital loan up to ₹10,000; incentives for repayment and digital transactions.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; 10th pass or 12th dropout; aged 18-45.
scheme_description: Skill training and certification scheme for youth.
application_process: Enrol via PMKVY official website or Skill India centres.
benefits: Skill training, certification, support for private sector participation; targets 8 lakh youth (2020-21).

scheme_name: Prime Minister Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
eligibility_criteria: Indian citizen; minimum 8th pass for projects above ₹10 lakh (manufacturing) and ₹5 lakh (services).
scheme_description: Provides financial assistance to set up new enterprises.
application_process: Apply online through the PMEGP portal.
benefits: Financial assistance to start a business in manufacturing or services.

scheme_name: Assistance to Ex-Servicemen in Penury
target_occupation: Non-pensioner Ex-Servicemen up to the rank of Havildar
eligibility_criteria: Non-pensioners up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force), aged 65 and above, not receiving any pension
scheme_description: Provides monthly assistance to elderly ex-servicemen not receiving a pension.
benefits: Rs. 4,000 per month for life

scheme_name: Assistance for Education of Children/Widows of ESM
eligibility_criteria: Children of ESM up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force)
scheme_description: Financial support for education of dependent children of ESM.
benefits: Rs. 1,000 per month per child (paid annually)

scheme_name: Assistance to 100% Disabled Children of ESM
eligibility_criteria: Children of ESM up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force) with 100% disability
scheme_description: Monthly financial aid to fully disabled children of ESM.
benefits: Rs. 3,000 per month

scheme_name: Assistance for Marriage of Daughters of ESM/Remarriage of Widows
eligibility_criteria: ESM up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force)
scheme_description: One-time financial support for marriage of daughters or remarriage of widows.
benefits: Rs. 50,000 per daughter and Rs. 50,000 for widow remarriage

scheme_name: Assistance to Non-Pensioner ESM for Medical Treatment
eligibility_criteria: Non-pensioners up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force)
scheme_description: Annual reimbursement for basic medical expenses.
benefits: Maximum of Rs. 50,000 per year

scheme_name: Assistance to Orphan Children of ESM
target_occupation: Orphan sons and unmarried daughters of ESM
eligibility_criteria: All ranks
scheme_description: Monthly aid for orphaned children of ESM.
benefits: Rs. 3,000 per month

scheme_name: Assistance for Vocational Training of Widows of ESM
eligibility_criteria: ESM widows up to the rank of Havildar (or equivalent in Navy/Air Force)
scheme_description: One-time assistance for vocational skill development after course completion.
benefits: Up to Rs. 50,000 (on successful completion)

scheme_name: Assistance for Treatment of Serious Diseases
eligibility_criteria: Non-pensioners across all ranks
scheme_description: Financial help for costly treatments such as cancer, dialysis, joint replacement.
benefits: Up to Rs. 1,50,000 per year (Rs. 75,000 for cancer and dialysis)

scheme_name: Assistance for Procurement of Mobility Equipment for Disabled ESM
eligibility_criteria: All ranks, with 50% or more disability post-retirement
scheme_description: Financial assistance to procure mobility equipment like wheelchairs.
benefits: Maximum of Rs. 1,00,000 per ESM

scheme_name: Assistance as Interest Subsidy on Home Loan to ESM
eligibility_criteria: War-bereaved families, war-disabled individuals, and attributable peacetime casualties
scheme_description: Interest subsidy for home loans to select ESM categories.
benefits: Subsidy on loan up to Rs. 1,00,000
